# motionDirection

**Instance Property**

The direction that the caption button view tilts in response to user interaction on the remote.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var motionDirection: TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection/horizontal].

## Setting the Motion Direction

- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection**: The directions that the caption button view can tilt in response to user interactions on the remote.
